highLevelSummary: Deprecate the price field in the v1 products endpoint and introduce a new v2 endpoint with priceInCents and formattedPrice fields. The v1 endpoint must remain fully functional during the transition period; existing clients must continue to work without modification.

apis.name: GET /api/v1/products/:id
apis.description: Retrieve product by ID (v1). The price field is now deprecated; clients should migrate to v2.

apis.name: GET /api/v2/products/:id
apis.description: Retrieve product by ID (v2). Returns priceInCents and formattedPrice instead of the deprecated price field.
